title: Why does comet.. miss?
body:
I don't see how this is a good thing for poke mages (they are aren't in the best spot honestly)
Their late-game is pretty lackluster too, especially when their job is to peel for the team.. while everyone else can flash roll their face across the keyboard and proc electrocute + kill you instantly . . then ur comet misses LOL.

I can see why after-shock would miss (it doesn't) but it's really there for the extra survival not for damage.
